name: MitziTalk
_source: s;Mitzi;Simon, you'll be proud to know that I've decided on a name.
s;Mitzi;The chronicle I'm writing.{w} Your work deserves to be remembered.
s;Simon;A chronicle?{w} We've just barely escaped Troy, and you're writing a story?
s;Mitzi;Writing your story, Simon.{w} Someone ought to remember you.|Remember us.
s;Simon;Hopefully, we won't be relegated to memory any time soon.
s;Mitzi;Agreed. But these stories can help hold up a throne too.
s;Simon;You think I want to supplant Morrissey?

s;Mitzi;If this comes to blows, you will have to.|If we avoid battle, you will have your own demesne.|Either way, you will rule.|Strength brings stability.|And only those who know someone's strength can respect it.
